meta.name: description
meta.value: Confirmation with custom prompt provided by the app.

parameter.name: customResponsesEnabled
parameter.description: If custom responses from apps are enabled

parameter.name: customResponse
parameter.description: A custom confirmation provided by the app

parameter.name: intentCategory
parameter.description: The intent category from the intent response, as a string

parameter.name: intentVerb
parameter.description: The intent verb from the intent response
